Windlord/BlackFang/Rodimus/Sedna:::

Sedna caught Organics and Slowly landed, she quickly checked her 
injuries but at time tried to be on guard to cover themselves.

Windlord and Blackfang, Opened fire against the Sweeps that are 
attaking Malice "Let him alone!!!" shouted angered Windlord while he 
flew towards them.

rodimus when he see that The Vork being saved Organics, he focused 
against the Sweeps trying to save Malice and he opened com link to 
all bots involved to battle "Cover the maxis femmes and destroy the 
Sweeps"

After that advice he opened fire against the Sweeps.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Organics/ Hellplague/ Sweeps:
>  
> The shots impact against Malice's body, causing damage.  His 
attention was not on his injuries, but they started healing slowly.  
He leveled the Chaos Breaker, and returned fire.
>  
> The Sweep carrying Organics was attacked from behind and lost it's 
hold of her.  She was powerless to help herself, and so fell, to 
crash to the ground in a matter of seconds.
>  
> Hellplague roared in pain as the Sweep worked on her arms.  Though 
he made progress, it was slow going.  With Organics out of their 
possession, Hellplague ordered the remaining Sweeps to attack one bot
>  
> Malice.
>  
> The Sweeps obey their master and mob attack the bounty hunter.  
They could ove power him, but it was in question due to his great 
power.  They tried to beat and wear him down, not concerned with 
anything else.
>

she

to
